name: Grappfiltrator
description:
This is the demo for a game I've been working on for the past few months. The gameplay focuses on linear platformer levels with semi-complex movement. A little under halfway through, you get a grappling hook to help with exploration. I'm not sure if I'll make this into a full game, but if I do, there will be a full story and many more features.  So far, nothing is final (especially the audio) and it is still fairly buggy, but it should represent the overall idea of the game. Thanks for playing!

Code/Design- Aaron Moseley

Art- Thomas Noll

Uses:

Pixel UI- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/pixel-ui-128440

A* Pathfinding Project- https://arongranberg.com/astar/
